Reviews.Title: “It's a WHAT???”
Reviews.Author: DaKine1098
Reviews.Content: What a gem. I wanted someplace relatively cheap (87 euro) and close to the train station. Didn't know it was a Catholic conference center. Not sure what the other poster said in German but I bet it was good. The hotel was quiet, close to lots of restaurants, and had a first-rate breakfast. Free internet connection in the room. Obviously, party animals should look elsewhere because it's about as low-key as you can get. Modern but nothing fancy about it, either. If you want plain and simple (and neat and quiet), it's the place to go.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Aquino
HotelInfo.Address: Hannoversche Strasse 5b | Tagungszentrum Katholische Akademie, 10115 Berlin, Germany
